files.patch:
@@ -53,1 +53,1 @@
-        // Use the same heap size as make/Images.gmk
+        // Try to reduce indeterminism of GC heap sizing and evacuation.
@@ -55,0 +55,2 @@
+        baseArgs.add("-Xms128M");
+        baseArgs.add("-Xmn120M");
@@ -83,1 +85,1 @@
-            .addPrefix("-Xlog:cds=debug")
+            .addPrefix("-Xlog:cds=debug,gc=debug")
